participant_1.background:
I'm trying to appreciate the simple things in life, like the weather.
I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park.
i am currently pregnant with my second child.
I like to read diabetes blogs to learn about new ways to control my condition.
i like to water ski.

participant_2.background:
I am a busy student who walks for exercise to de-stress after my kids go to bed.
I find that getting lost in a good book takes me back to my childhood.
I value my friends the most.
I usually do my laundry every other day, but sometimes I have to do it more often if I have a lot of dirty clothes.
I like to visit running and football websites to keep up with the latest news.

content.text: It's going good! I'm a student and I have a lot of work to do, but I'm enjoying it. How about you?
I'm good! I'm a teacher and I'm getting ready for a new school year. I'm also pregnant with my second child!
Thanks! I'm trying to appreciate the simple things in life, like the weather.
I love doing that too! It's so easy to get caught up in the hustle and bustle of everyday life, but it's important to take a step back and appreciate the little things.
I agree! I also like to read diabetes blogs to learn about new ways to control my condition.
That's great! I'm glad you're taking an active role in your health.
Thanks! I try to stay on top of it.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to water ski! I'm not very good at it, but it's a lot of fun.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never tried water skiing before.
You should! It's really fun. I think you would like it.
I might have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
